typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (genres as string[], movieid as string, rating as string, title as string, year as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> JSONSource
JSONSource derive(movies = @(movieid=movies.movieid,
		title=movies.title,
		genres=map(movies.genres,upper(#item)),
		year=movies.year,
		rating=movies.rating)) ~> Derivedcolumn1
Derivedcolumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['myoutputfile.avro'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
